samples.question: Where do you usually go running?

samples.question: Do you think running is a good way to stay healthy?
samples.transcript: Well absolutely For those who want to stay lean and maintain a chiseled physique running is a good option However it not the only choice as not everyone are familiar with the intensity of running So they can make do with less physically demanding activities like running I sorry jockeying or cycling Thank you.

samples.question: Have you told anyone about this experience?
samples.transcript: Needless to say, I need not have told anyone because everyone knew about that humiliating experience because I do not stop in the middle of the room and everyone knew that I was sleeping. The invigilator even had to come to my desk and knock me on the head in order to snap me out of my trance.

samples.question: The first question is, on what occasions do people need to keep awake even when they are tired?
samples.transcript: I think it would be difficult to categorize them separately, so I am just going to list out a few.
samples.transcript_original: I think it would be difficult to categorize them separately, so I'm just gonna list out a few.
samples.transcript_cleaned: I think it would be difficult to categorize them separately, so I am just going to list out a few.

samples.question: So first, the first that jumps to my mind is social events, right?
samples.transcript: Celebrities and politicians, they are always on the go and the need to, you know, keep up appearances might wear them out eventually. And I think that ineffective time management might also be attributable to this trend. Because if you do not finish your workload on time, it is only natural that you, you are going to have to put in more hours. And you will sacrifice for the sleep in the process.
samples.transcript_original: Um, celebrities and politicians, they are always on the go and the need to, you know, keep up appearances might wear them out eventually. And I think that um, ineffective time management might also be attributable to this trend. Because if you don't finish your workload on time, it's only natural that you, you're gonna have to put in more hours. And you will sacrifice for the sleep in the process.
samples.transcript_cleaned: Celebrities and politicians, they are always on the go and the need to, you know, keep up appearances might wear them out eventually. And I think that ineffective time management might also be attributable to this trend. Because if you do not finish your workload on time, it is only natural that you, you are going to have to put in more hours. And you will sacrifice for the sleep in the process.

samples.question: How do people keep awake when they are tired?
samples.transcript: Well, I think it goes without saying that the best defense against excessive sleepiness it is definitely caffeine. this is a substance most commonly found in tea and coffee and it is said to have to make you more more aware and give you a heightened sense of alertness to your surroundings. if you want to wake up feeling energized then I think a cup of caffeinated beverage is your go-to choice. Okay Why do people feel tired a lot nowadays Well generally speaking chronic fatigue is the result of an enduring lack of sleep and other physical and psychological factors Some people suffer from a persistent sleeping disorder either genetically or from stress So in this fast world people working longer hours and biting off more than they can chew and that leaves little room for rest This explains why some people show up at work looking all drained and wary. Alright.

Um, this is a substance most commonly found in tea and coffee and it's said to have to make you more more aware and give you a heightened sense of alertness to your surroundings. Um, if you want to wake up feeling energized then I think a cup of caffeinated beverage is your go-to choice. Okay Why do people feel tired a lot nowadays Well generally speaking chronic fatigue is the result of an enduring lack of sleep and other physical and psychological factors Some people suffer from a persistent sleeping disorder either genetically or from stress So in this fast world people working longer hours and biting off more than they can chew and that leaves little room for rest This explains why some people show up at work looking all drained and wary. Alright,.

Okay Why do people feel tired a lot nowadays Well generally speaking chronic fatigue is the result of an enduring lack of sleep and other physical and psychological factors Some people suffer from a persistent sleeping disorder either genetically or from stress So in this fast world people working longer hours and biting off more than they can chew and that leaves little room for rest This explains why some people show up at work looking all drained and wary.

samples.question: Do you like singing?
